|brand = Linksys |model = MX4200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = (MX4050) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 8 April 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Linksys_MX4200 |wlclass = AX4200 |series = Velop |type = wireless system, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7S-03580 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48SAQB11.0GA |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8174; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz <!-- 1.4 GHz 1.4 GHz (+ 2x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Fidelix;FMND4G08S3K-ID; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15T2G16128A-DEB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- doc? --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, WPA3, Mesh, heatsink, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85340-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN AX FEM;Skyworks;SKY85755-11;;6; ,,, 80MHz ARM (Cortex-M33) MCU;EFR;EFR32MG21;;1;,,, Power Management IC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = SAQB1 |manuf_rev = 1.0GA |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/23/2020 |estreldate = 07/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07Z5NZ9CQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAQB11.0GA" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. {{See also|List of Linksys Wireless Devices|Wistron NeWeb}} {{FCC ST|02/01/2021|indexme.}}
*[[Linksys MX4200]] (MX4050) - ''Velop AX4200 Mesh WiFi 6 System'' :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/K7S-03580 K7S-03580] (2020-07-23) • MX4050/US (SAQB-L1)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.acwifi.net/11745.html ''Linksys MX4200 WiFi 6 System'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/11805.html ''Linksys MX4200 WiFi 6 System'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/10155.html ''Linksys MX5300 WiFi 6 System'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN)
===Models=== *[[Linksys MX5 Velop AX]] (AX5300) - Velop AX Whole Home WiFi 6 System *[[Linksys MX10 Velop AX]] (AX5300) - Velop AX Whole Home WiFi 6 System *[[Linksys MX4200]] (AX4200) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8174 (4x 1.4GHz) • [https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/velop-mx12600-ax4200-tri-band-mesh-wifi-6-system/ Spec.] *[[Linksys MX5300]] (AX5300) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A (4x 2.2GHz) • [https://www.acwifi.net/10155.html TD] *[[Linksys MX8500]] (MX85EC, MX85MS, MX85WH) - Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router :WFA ID: WFA109988 (2021-01-14) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_mx4200_v1_and_v2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = qualcommax |subtarget = ipq807x |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = 160mhz bands |comment = }} Please insert instructions here

==See also== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[Linksys]] • [https://www.linksys.com/us/c/wireless-routers/ Wireless Routers] *[[Linksys AXE8400]] (AX8400) • CES2021 ($450/$850/$1200) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/01/12/linksys-axe8400-is-the-worlds-first-wifi-6e-router/ Review] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-1210-platform ''Networking Pro 1210''] Quad-core (ARM-Cortex A53) <!-- :System Memory: TBD DDR3/DDR4 (1GB ?); Storage: TBD (256MB ?) :Connectivity: 1x WAN (5GbE), 4x LAN (1GbE) Gigabit Ethernet ports :Wi-Fi: Tri-band: 4.8Gbps (6GHz), 2.4Gbps (5GHz), 1.2Gbps (2.4GHz) :Wi-Fi 6E (6GHz) with 14x 80MHz channels / 7x 160MHz channels :Wi-Fi 6 (2.4GHz/5GHz), 802.11ac (Wave 2), 802.11n, 802.11a/b/g :WiFi clients: up to 64 clients; USB: 1x USB 3.0 ports --> *[[Linksys E8450]] (AX3200) - AX3200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router • [https://www.acwifi.net/12316.html Review] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622/MT7615N/MT7915A (MT7911AN/MT7975AN) :Wi-Fi: 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 2400Mbps (5GHz); WAN/LAN: 1x/4x (1GbE)
*[[Linksys MR7350]] (AX1800) - Max-Stream Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR7350/ PPage] :FCC ID: Q87-08151 (2020-03-31) • Dual-Band 802.11ax Wireless Router *[[Linksys MR7500]] (MR75WH) - AXE6600 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Mesh Router :WFA ID: WFA111136 (2021-03-16) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz) <!-- Linux 4.4.60 --> *[[Linksys MR8300]] (AC2200) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR8300/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9000]] (AC3000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9000/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9600]] (AX6000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9600/ PPage] :CPU: 1.8GHz Quad Core, WAN/LAN: 1x/4x 1GbE, 2x USB 3.0 • [https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/linksys-mr9600-dual-band-mesh-wifi-6-router/ Spec.]
